"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./Admin.css" const AddProductForm = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", description: "", price: "", category: "", image: "", inventory: "", featured: false, material: "", dimensions: "", weight: "", }) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setError(null) try { // Validate form data if (!formData.name || !formData.price || !formData.category) { throw new Error("Please fill in all required fields") } const productData = { ...formData, price: Number.parseFloat(formData.price), inventory: formData.inventory ? Number.parseInt(formData.inventory) : 0, } const response = await fetch("/api/products", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(productData), }) if (!response.ok) { const errorData = await response.json() throw new Error(errorData.message || "Failed to add product") } setSuccess(true) // Reset form after successful submission setFormData({ name: "", description: "", price: "", category: "", image: "", inventory: "", featured: false, material: "", dimensions: "", weight: "", }) // Redirect after a short delay setTimeout(() => { navigate("/admin/products") }, 2000) } catch (err) { setError(err.message) } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (

Add New Product

{success &&
Product added successfully! Redirecting...
} {error &&
{error}
}
